comments:
Searching through the newsgroups I found the answer: It turns out I hadn't 
registered a resource factory as outlined in:

 http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/indextech.cgi/~checkout~/xsd-
home/docs/javadoc/org/eclipse/xsd/util/XSDPrototypicalSchema.html#printSchema
(java.lang.String) 

perhaps the error message should be a little clearer. That is why I am leaving 
the bug as new.

I've changed ResourceSetImpl like this:

281c281
<         throw new RuntimeException("Cannot create a resource for '" + uri + 
"'");
---
>         throw new RuntimeException("Cannot create a resource for '" + uri + 
"'; a registered resource factory is needed");
